name: 4Balls
description:
The goal of the game is to keep the balls in place! But those bad balls keep getting out of place!

Click the balls to return them to the right spot. Every time the bar fills up completely you will get 3 points and another ball will appear until you have 4 balls. After this the point ball will appear, which you can click for extra point!

developing and credits

For this game (my third gamejam game ever) I tried to focus more on the animations. This means the gameplay itself is mayby a little bit less good, but I really like the final result anyway!

I tried to make the music respond to the level of stress, but this turned out a little bit less good then I hoped.

This game was made in Godot, the music was made with Auxy pro and the sprites where made with Affinity designer.
